title.rendered: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug Trailer Gets The Lego Treatment

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

We’ve seen The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug teaser trailer before, but now the internet has come through again with a Lego trailer.

Check it out below!

Pretty well done, especially the "falling down a waterfall in a barrel" part. 

It is this stop-motion style that The Lego Movie trailer seems to be paying homage too. Always nice to see the fans and their creations getting a nod from the higher ups.
